nodes.text: A Sorin v3 Avalon was a model of podracer.

The podracer Skall Delos owned a modified v3 Avalon during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. It had slim, triple engines that were painted red and blue-colored cockpit, that was furnished with nerf hide. He used the pod in the Cularin Swamp Run, a race on the planet Cularin. However, Alina Impeveri caused the pod to crash during the race, destroying it.
